role_description: An Ansible role that installs slack-term (a Slack client for your terminal) on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [slack-term](https://github.com/erroneousboat/slack-term) features a colorful interface as well as keyboard shortcuts. It is one of, if not the, most well-received [Slack](https://slack.com/) client available on GitHub.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs slack-term (a Slack client for your terminal) on nearly any platform.
